dcterms:description: A famous industry benchmark dataset for CTR prediction, which has 45 million users’ click records in 26 categorical features and 13 numerical features on displayed ads. Given a user and the page he is visiting, the goal is to predict the probability that he will click on a given ad.
dcterms:title: Criteo

dcterms:description: Contains users’ click behaviors including whether a displayed mobile ad is clicked by a user or not. There are 23 categorical feature fields including user/device features and ad attributes.
dcterms:title: Avazu

dcterms:description: A widely used recommender system dataset, which contains about 1,000,000 rating records of 4,000 movies by 6,000 users. Although the ratings range from 0 to 5, we treat it as a binary classification task.
dcterms:title: MovieLens-1M
